title: Dipping sheep
brief_description: Stresses the importance, at dipping time, of making a clean muster and dipping all sheep on the property. The importance of keeping sheep in the bath for a sufficient length of time and the necessity of following the manufacturer’s instructions when mixing the dip are also stressed. Various types of spray plants and plunge dips are shown.
